SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="ba75298f7247498fbfafae9f40ad2837" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're the one who had the good sense
to rescue me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What was your name again?
Was it...[etc:Wait frame="8"/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ba75298f7247498fbfafae9f40ad2837" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Oh my,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] where are my manners?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I should
introduce myself.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I am the accomplished
musical genius [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal18"/]Fris√©[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ba75298f7247498fbfafae9f40ad2837" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Can you believe I joined the TV station on
their spaceship only to end up in an awful
crash?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] My cosmic talent was nearly lost!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="35920d3716de486db73e8e47b218ff71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I believe my encounter with the ancient
life of this planet was orchestrated by a
muse of music.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="35920d3716de486db73e8e47b218ff71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Nothing shows the heart of a culture like
music![etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's bound to be some [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]musical
treasures [System:Color name="Default"]here to play on![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="35920d3716de486db73e8e47b218ff71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Could I perhaps impose upon you to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gather
[System:Color name="Default"]them for me?
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="3fb000450a8e4caf8248f9f9c148fba3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Your face...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Is this...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]an homage to me?!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="7be8f79d4c4d4f989b9a2d80c9e28edb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Such vigorous breathing...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You have the
lungs of a singer,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you?!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="adbc67856bcb4d139759088e9440dc79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]That tail of yours is like a metronome.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It tickles my creative appetite![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I feel like I
could compose a song with splendid timing!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="09d1b25574b64cf79a44c14323c90f18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Look at that![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've collected all of the
musical treasures?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="09d1b25574b64cf79a44c14323c90f18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHandsFaceOnly"/]How extraordinary, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="09d1b25574b64cf79a44c14323c90f18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]To show my appreciation,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I offer you my
instrument![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I plan to dedicate myself to
working with these new instruments.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="3ec2fe17bc464d1a85a0d8254ec2a667" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]This trumpet is quite intriguing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The sound
of it makes one feel compelled to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]step
right into formation[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3ec2fe17bc464d1a85a0d8254ec2a667" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]If you hold down [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button_Tairetsufue" scale="0.66"/] and conduct with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick_Tairetsufue" scale="0.66"/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I believe it could be used to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]control a
squad of Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3ec2fe17bc464d1a85a0d8254ec2a667" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You should be able to master it with some
practice, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="ede94f52fa3f42278af949263acbef22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Oh my![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You collected all of this for me?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ede94f52fa3f42278af949263acbef22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Thank you, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="6db18a1fc373445a84ff9523c0c118a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A muse of music is calling out to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6db18a1fc373445a84ff9523c0c118a5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I must bring out the instruments of this
planet and compose something new!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="2d3a96f8cd754fe8bf64ec22a15b13c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Oh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You gathered these instrumental
treasures?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2d3a96f8cd754fe8bf64ec22a15b13c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHandsFaceOnly"/]I can't believe you collected everything![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
How remarkable, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2d3a96f8cd754fe8bf64ec22a15b13c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]To show my appreciation,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I offer you my
instrument![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I plan to dedicate myself to
working with these new instruments.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="e1209a9cd33748c2b826f3be4488e55a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]This trumpet is quite intriguing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The sound
of it makes one feel compelled to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]step
right into formation[System:Color name="Default"]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e1209a9cd33748c2b826f3be4488e55a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]If you hold down [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button_Tairetsufue" scale="0.66"/] and conduct with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick_Tairetsufue" scale="0.66"/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I believe it could be used to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]control a
squad of Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e1209a9cd33748c2b826f3be4488e55a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You should be able to master it with some
practice, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e1209a9cd33748c2b826f3be4488e55a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]I have borne witness to a miraculous
accomplishment![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Truly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a muse of music
smiles upon me.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="56c40b26331840f0ac8f6199b8a54177" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Oh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I had planned to ask you to look for
this treasure...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="56c40b26331840f0ac8f6199b8a54177" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]How like you to have already started
collecting, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="b73104b5b19749cd831a4411ae093f70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]It seems I am bearing witness to a small
miracle![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You started before I could ask![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b73104b5b19749cd831a4411ae093f70" Scale="1"/]Truly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a muse of music smiles upon me.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="0cd045518d624d8b973b448de7cf4531" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Thanks to the musical treasures you've
gathered,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I now have an endless flood of
new song ideas pouring out.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="969d3485a86049e3a5358f00d3419792" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]My creative power is bursting forth in
fortissimo![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="38dc61cf2a0f4def80f58f4deb89f24c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]What do you mean they're stopping
filming?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They're reworking the plan for
the program?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="38dc61cf2a0f4def80f58f4deb89f24c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Well...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Whatever happened to informing
the talent?!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="7486966461ad47cab93be36b87eaae50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]No...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I am truly the embodiment of the
spirit of music.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The impact this will have
on my creativity is utterly nonexistent!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="da813848ff894679b4309c21ecacd096" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That's right![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The piece I am currently
composing shall be devoted to this planet!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="0cfd8a8d4eed4de2a08196ebe6fcd4c5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A muse of music is calling out to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0cfd8a8d4eed4de2a08196ebe6fcd4c5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I must bring out the instruments of this
planet and compose something new!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="9fccd1912ee742679730a75103b07e38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I can't compose a genuine song without
experiencing the setting for myself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All
art should be authentic!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="edee797f40414b15bd30ed7a97f9a78e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My search for genuine music is the reason
I was so passionate about joining the TV
crew on this adventure in the first place.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="da4afdd3340a49a4b9d48ce6049f54a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've noticed something about that
reporter...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal17"/]Muggs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] was it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="da4afdd3340a49a4b9d48ce6049f54a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]At times she just stares at me with this
perplexed expression.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Should I perhaps
talk about less intellectual subjects?
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="56a7934c26de4f2a8e17e395868e6e3c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Of course I recognize the director's talent.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The videos he makes are quite trendy and
engaging!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="7b1a43d038694a15ac9985f48c8e3156" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal20"/]Vonda[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I work together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's
more talent than one location can handle.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="37816e2fef774cfeb9be87960947ba67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]An interplanetary opera singer with her
vocal skill could probably get even the
gods of space to pay attention.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="37816e2fef774cfeb9be87960947ba67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]As someone favored by a muse of music,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I am perhaps the only one who can speak
to her as an equal.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="f555716099cb46bb80f795a4c72d71eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Thanks to the musical treasures you've
gathered,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I now have an endless flood of
new song ideas pouring out.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="a0d94e613e0241ed91d66195aa2087e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]My creative power is bursting forth in
fortissimo![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="6804e183ff2f4feda2f87b7d19aa76d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you want to know why I was on the TV
station's spaceship?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Of course you do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6804e183ff2f4feda2f87b7d19aa76d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm a genuine composer![etc:Wait frame="15"/] A maestro
of music![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was brought along to compose
the music for a program.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6804e183ff2f4feda2f87b7d19aa76d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Unfortunately,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] all but one of my precious
instruments became lost in the crash.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6804e183ff2f4feda2f87b7d19aa76d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]That's why I need those musical treasures!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="ebf2d62256bf47a78c24ceddddd7631e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I can't compose a genuine song without
experiencing the setting for myself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All
art should be authentic!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="78a25ea0f7e74617beab6896ef8b3c83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My search for genuine music is the reason
I was so passionate about joining the TV
crew on this adventure in the first place.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="f16b5e4765ec43c7b2a18478be272835" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've noticed something about that
reporter...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal17"/]Muggs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] was it?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f16b5e4765ec43c7b2a18478be272835" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]At times she just stares at me with this
perplexed expression.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Should I perhaps
talk about less intellectual subjects?
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="2c25334b3169479ba5c4eb29477cdfa6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Just as expected![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's no wonder my
genius recognized the great promise
in you, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2c25334b3169479ba5c4eb29477cdfa6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Be that as it may,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm certain there are
more instrument treasures still waiting
to be discovered on this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2c25334b3169479ba5c4eb29477cdfa6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Please continue your search!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="eabad3f77d7e4801b32b2a9913f9f244" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Of course I recognize the director's talent.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The videos he makes are quite trendy and
engaging!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="ca0dc6c8b4b7453dba97795998c327b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]In my opinion,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the director is still beating
his head against a creative wall.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="826fadda78b945ab8ab73477ce7b91a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It seems clear to me that it will take some
time yet for the director to reach the
level of genius I have attained.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="5fa8ddd0c32e4a8db30a5d9845859f3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You've gathered so many![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I knew you could
do it, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5fa8ddd0c32e4a8db30a5d9845859f3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Thanks to your efforts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my creative
inspiration is stoked up to a raging blaze![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5fa8ddd0c32e4a8db30a5d9845859f3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]More![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need more musical treasures!
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="6211dd4bfc8241a39b136f8633be34c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal20"/]Vonda[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] who I came here with,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] has a genuine
talent for singing as well.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="2a244be858ad47fa9148e192a3dce4af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal20"/]Vonda[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I work together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's
more talent than one location can handle.
SV017.SV017_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="9a66c541b6244f8984b16f9ff5c33873" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]An interplanetary opera singer with her
vocal skill could probably get even the
gods of space to pay attention.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9a66c541b6244f8984b16f9ff5c33873" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]As someone favored by a muse of music,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I am perhaps the only one who can speak
to her as an equal.
